FuncDef:
The key-usage command configures the purpose description for a certificate public key.
The undo key-usage command deletes the purpose description of a certificate public key. The key-usage command configures the purpose description for a certificate public key. The undo key-usage command deletes the purpose description of a certificate public key. By default, a certificate public key does not have a purpose description.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a certificate public key for signature.
-

Specifies a certificate public key for encryption.
